data.eml:eml: A new species of Aphis (Hemiptera: Aphididae) in Missouri on St. John’s Wort, Hypericum kalmianum, and re-description of Aphis hyperici Monell

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lagos, Doris M., Puttler, Benjamin, Voegtlin, David J., Giordano, Rosanna (2012): A new species of Aphis (Hemiptera: Aphididae) in Missouri on St. John’s Wort, Hypericum kalmianum, and re-description of Aphis hyperici Monell. Zootaxa 3478: 81-92, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210015
